import _objectSpread from"/home/mahi/Downloads/social_media/client/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/objectSpread2.js";/*it will get all our profile and also others profile if we visit their page , if there is no profile for the user it will give profile error status and if we want to move to new user previous users profile need to cleard */import{GET_PROFILE,PROFILE_ERROR,CLEAR_PROFILE,UPDATE_PROFILE,GET_PROFILES,GET_REPOS}from"../actions/types";var initialState={profile:null,// it is for profile listing page
profiles:[],repos:[],loading:true,error:{}};export default function(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;var type=action.type,payload=action.payload;switch(type){case GET_PROFILE:case UPDATE_PROFILE:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{profile:payload,loading:false});case GET_PROFILES:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{profiles:payload,loading:false});case PROFILE_ERROR:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{error:payload,loading:false});case CLEAR_PROFILE:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{profile:null,repos:[],loading:false});case GET_REPOS:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{repos:payload,loading:false});default:return state;}}
